name: Trade Disturbance
description:
A small shopping center has a big problem. After a sale at the end of the day, many people leave behind personal items. Many items are in places that are logical for them, but this is not certain. Your task is to find and collect them all before the store opens.

Trade Disturbance is a hidden object game. Use a free overview of different zones and find the required things from the list to complete the level. The game uses your memory and attention to detail well.

Game Features:
- Low poly voxel graphics
- Attention and memory training
- Lots of items to find
